node.html:
• A startup to provide research and development in the field of embedded systems to industries in various sactors like security, healthcare, bio-chemistry, automation etc.
  • Developed mBEDed One (an arduino-based development board) and arkAvr (An AVR Programmer).
  • About to launch some exciting IoT based Product soon.

• Provided research, design and development in product designing and robotics department.
  • Worked on mind-controlled wheel chair.
  • Built a saftey pendent for SOS along within an eye striking jewel.
• Provided research, design and development and teaching services in R&D department.
• Provided design and development and teaching services.

• Result of an idea which include the free consultant service to needy and hobbyists of electronics and embedded system.
  • It was an online organization just provides services by blog, emails and chats. Resulted in mBEDed µSystems later on.

• Completed a learning program on embedded design and programming.
  • Made a project clock display on LCD with alarm system by using microcontroller (PERIPHERAL INTERFACE CONTROLLER)
